title: ORGANISE
description: Organise your leads pipeline, ongoing framework and projects using visual workflow and project boards.

title: COLLABORATE
description: Collaborate with your team members and partners using deal notes, task, live chat and visual status tools.

title: CONNECT
description: Connect with clients using integrated VoIP phone, SMS, E-Mail, live chat and Client Portal.

title: AUTOMATE
description: Allocate tasks, create notifications, updates and reminders and produce documents with workflow automation.
